featured.text: By the way, if you can, please send this letter back to us.
Which advertisements are NOT placed by foreign companies? (Write down the letters representing such advertisements.)
In this method of printing, individual letters were made from separate pieces of metal.
When asked what color is evoked by a letter or number, synesthetic people would persistently give the same answer even if tested months or years apart.

other.text: The first printing was done from wood blocks one letter at a time by hand.
They wrote letters to the tuna companies and supermarkets asking them to find a way to spare dolphins.
Where is Eleanor’s letter sent to? (A)
The King agreed and gave Nehemiah a letter “to the governors of the province beyond the river,” requesting safe passage for him as he travelled through their lands.
The first English book printed in movable type was (A) done from wood blocks one letter at a time.
Now that we all use pencils, doodling is on the increase, and the quality of pencilwomanship is impressive, as you can tell from my handwriting in this letter.
Which of the following is NOT mentioned in the passage as a form of passport? (A) A letter.
When the printing was finished, the letters could be taken apart and rearranged to print something else.
Mary wrote a letter of to the manufacturer after her new car broke down three times in the same week.
Which advertisement does not need direct contact by making telephone calls? (Write down the letter representing the advertisement.)
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a reason for writing the letter?
If these letters were linked over and pressed on to paper, they would print the words.
On the basis of the letter, is the most likely relationship between Sally and Tom? (A) Mother and son.
In some cases, people with synesthesia may experience colors when they hear, read, or even think of letters and numbers.

definition.zh_def: 字母或信件的書寫形式，通常用於交流或傳遞信息。
definition.en_def: A written or printed message addressed to a person or organization.
definition.example: She received a letter from her friend yesterday.
